Black Lemon Fem Description

The iconic Black Lemon has arrived in a feminized version, and it’s better than ever. With THC levels soaring to an impressive 25-27%, this strain is designed for experienced smokers who crave powerful effects. Its lemony flavor, beloved in the auto version, is even bolder and more potent here, thanks to the feminized genetics. The balanced 50/50 effects deliver a harmonious blend of uplifting energy and deep relaxation, making it perfect for anytime use.

This strain produces dark purple buds that are both visually stunning and highly productive, offering a generous yield. The smooth, flavorful smoke enhances the experience, taking the citrusy profile to new heights. Whether you’re chasing potency, flavor, or a reliable feminized grow, Black Lemon Fem delivers on every front.
